__e: And if You can't show us the way, then forgive us for being lost.
Yeah, and who knows what trouble may be caused if those lost souls had stayed around.
Whose sole purpose is to bring light to the shadows and a little bit of joy to all those lost souls who can no longer find it.
And every day without hope is a day closer to becoming a lost boy.
Is there a place where we can hide from the lost boys?
(Panting) Henry, don't you know the best thing about being a lost boy?
